data: For years it was the dream of our life—I should say our lives, since my wife shared this vision with me—to own an abandoned farm.
For years it was the dream of our life--I should say our lives, since my wife shared this vision with me--to own an abandoned farm.

The Abandoned Farmers
His Humorous Account of a Retreat from the City to the Farm
